metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0215 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
calendar/externallib.php in Moodle through 2.5.9, 2.6.x before 2.6.7, 2.7.x before 2.7.4, and 2.8.x before 2.8.2 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive calendar-event information via a web-services request.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0215` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1').
